mapper.select: SELECT id, ctprvn_cd as cityCode, ctprvn_nm as cityName, signgu_cd as districtCode, signgu_nm as districtName, edc_goal_cn as educationGoalContent, fclty_addr as facilityAddress, fclty_nm as facilityName, fclty_tel_no as facilityPhoneNumber, fclty_ty_nm as facilityTypeName, hmpg_url as homepageUrl, ldr_qualfc_cn as leaderQualificationContent, progrm_begin_de as programBeginDate, progrm_end_de as programEndDate, progrm_nm as programName, progrm_estbl_wkday_nm as programOperationDays, progrm_estbl_tizn_value as programOperationTime, progrm_prc as programPrice, progrm_prc_ty_nm as programPriceTypeName, progrm_rcrit_nmpr_co as programRecruitNumber, progrm_trget_nm as programTargetName, progrm_ty_nm as programTypeName, prtc_nmpr_partcpt_at as protectorParticipationYn, safe_managt_cn as safetyManagementContent, view_count as viewCount, created_at as createdAt FROM facility_program WHERE id = #{programId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO program_likes ( program_id, member_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{programId}, #{memberId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.ctprvn_cd as cityCode, p.ctprvn_nm as cityName, p.signgu_cd as districtCode, p.signgu_nm as districtName, p.edc_goal_cn as educationGoalContent, p.fclty_addr as facilityAddress, p.fclty_nm as facilityName, p.fclty_tel_no as facilityPhoneNumber, p.fclty_ty_nm as facilityTypeName, p.hmpg_url as homepageUrl, p.ldr_qualfc_cn as leaderQualificationContent, p.progrm_begin_de as programBeginDate, p.progrm_end_de as programEndDate, p.progrm_nm as programName, p.progrm_estbl_wkday_nm as programOperationDays, p.progrm_estbl_tizn_value as programOperationTime, p.progrm_prc as programPrice, p.progrm_prc_ty_nm as programPriceTypeName, p.progrm_rcrit_nmpr_co as programRecruitNumber, p.progrm_trget_nm as programTargetName, p.progrm_ty_nm as programTypeName, p.prtc_nmpr_partcpt_at as protectorParticipationYn, p.safe_managt_cn as safetyManagementContent, p.view_count as viewCount, p.created_at as createdAt FROM facility_program p WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM program_likes l WHERE l.member_id = #{memberId} AND l.program_id = p.id ) ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT DISTINCT ctprvn_nm FROM facility_program ORDER BY ctprvn_nm
SELECT DISTINCT signgu_nm FROM facility_program ORDER BY signgu_nm
SELECT DISTINCT fclty_ty_nm FROM facility_program ORDER BY fclty_ty_nm
SELECT DISTINCT progrm_ty_nm FROM facility_program ORDER BY progrm_ty_nm
SELECT DISTINCT progrm_trget_nm FROM facility_program ORDER BY progrm_trget_nm

SELECT p.id, p.ctprvn_cd as cityCode, p.ctprvn_nm as cityName, p.signgu_cd as districtCode, p.signgu_nm as districtName, p.edc_goal_cn as educationGoalContent, p.fclty_addr as facilityAddress, p.fclty_nm as facilityName, p.fclty_tel_no as facilityPhoneNumber, p.fclty_ty_nm as facilityTypeName, p.hmpg_url as homepageUrl, p.ldr_qualfc_cn as leaderQualificationContent, p.progrm_begin_de as programBeginDate, p.progrm_end_de as programEndDate, p.progrm_nm as programName, p.progrm_estbl_wkday_nm as programOperationDays, p.progrm_estbl_tizn_value as programOperationTime, p.progrm_prc as programPrice, p.progrm_prc_ty_nm as programPriceTypeName, p.progrm_rcrit_nmpr_co as programRecruitNumber, p.progrm_trget_nm as programTargetName, p.progrm_ty_nm as programTypeName, p.prtc_nmpr_partcpt_at as protectorParticipationYn, p.safe_managt_cn as safetyManagementContent, p.view_count as viewCount, p.created_at as createdAt FROM facility_program p INNER JOIN program_likes pl ON p.id = pl.program_id WHERE pl.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY pl.created_at DESC
